vlive.korean: 멜론 왜 작동 안 되지? Why isn't Melon working? 듣기 View video VICTON : Day-1!!💕💕
야 유나영 정상작동! Yoo Nayoung, normal operation. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [MAMAMOO] 오늘도 사이좋은 용쾅별쾅에 내 심장 정..상..작..동..! (Solar&Moon Byul acting ’Start love’)
아니 리모컨 작동법 모르는 거 아니야? You don't know how to use the remote? 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 몽슈슈 글로벌하우스 E11. [나랑 연애할래? 뛰어내릴래?]
vlive.english: You don't know how to use the remote?

vlive.korean: 야 너 작동법도 모르고 지금 여기 나온 거야? You don't even know how to use that? 듣기 View video 슈주 리턴즈 (SJ returns) : [슈주 리턴즈 : 스핀오프] 특규 리턴즈 픽쿡크라운 EP01
vlive.english: You don't even know how to use that?

vlive.korean: [실제 포클레인과 작동 원리는 같음] - 실제 포클레인이랑? - 네 - 진짜? [It operates like the real forklift] - The real forklift? - Yes. - Really? 듣기 View video 컨버전스티비 (CONS TV) : [커먼스쿨]성동공업고등학교 ep11(홍현희X정세운X강민아)
vlive.english: [It operates like the real forklift] - The real forklift? - Yes. - Really?

examples.korean: Solar panels can only operate in sunlight. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 태양광 판은 햇빛 속에서만 작동된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Solar panels can only operate in sunlight. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Does the computer beep on power-up? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 컴퓨터는 작동 시작 때 삐 하는 소리가 나나요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Does the computer beep on power-up? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The burglar alarm is activated by movement. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 도난 경보기는 움직임이 감지되면 작동된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The burglar alarm is activated by movement. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Regular servicing guarantees the smooth operation of the engine. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 정기적인 정비는 엔진의 원활한 작동을 보장한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Regular servicing guarantees the smooth operation of the engine. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It was one of those old-fashioned gramophones that winds up. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것은 태엽을 감으면 작동되는 그런 구식 축음기 가운데 하나였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
